class.name: Physics2DShapeQueryParameters
class.brief_description: Parameters to be sent to a 2D shape physics query.
class.description: This class contains the shape and other parameters for intersection/collision queries.

method.name: set_shape
method.description: Set the [Shape2D] that will be used for collision/intersection queries.

members.member: The physics layer the query should be made on.
The list of objects or object [RID]s, that will be excluded from collisions.
The collision margin for the shape.
The motion of the shape being queried for.
The [RID] of the queried shape. See [method set_shape] also.
the transform matrix of the queried shape.
